import data from "../../data/index.json"; export default function Testimonial() { return (

Clients Feedback

Customer Feedback

{data?.testimonial?.map((item, index) => (
{Array.from({ length: 5 }, (reviews, index) => ( ))}

{item.description}

{item.author_name}

{item.author_designation}

))}
); }
